content: Arianna, Great article and I identify so much! I haven’t awakened to an alarm clock for about 6 years now. I had to make a major shift to live a happier life. July 3 is my anniversary and while it took me some time to adjust, it was the best thing I could have done including the challenges and setbacks I have faced. I have been journaling for years. I decided to split them up and color coordinate! Yes, yes, I’m strange, I know.
